Question: This person and Addai helped the Colts to a 13–7 half-time lead, and an early fourth quarter touchdown upped the lead to 20–10.
Hints: This person was named AFC Offensive Player of the Month for the fourth time in his career in September.
This person also received the ESPY Award for Best NFL Player.
This person was released by the Colts on March 7, 2012.
